BabyDragon
  • cohere_response
  • View page source

cohere_response

babydragon.models.generators.cohere.cohere_response(prompt, model='command', max_tokens=1000)[source]

Call the Cohere API with the given prompt and maximum number of output tokens.

Parameters:

  • prompt (List[dict]) – A list of strings representing the prompt to send to the API.

  • max_output_tokens – An integer representing the maximum number of output tokens.

  • model (str) – A string representing the model to use. either command or command-nightly

  • max_tokens (int) –

Returns:

A tuple containing the API response cohere object and a boolean indicating success.

Return type:

Tuple[Dict, bool]
